overview: The film follows Nives Jagodic in her research about her grandfather Dr. Joza Jagodic, doctor in Bjelovar's general hospital, who posthumously got the acknowledgment "Righteous among the Nations". Through her travels and conversation with the man whose life was saved by Dr. Joza Jagodic, we will find how much he risked throughout the whole WW2 in order to save civilians from certain death. His example will show us what makes people do something noble and righteous and even risk their own lives.
title: Some Things Shouldn't Be Hidden
